entry.title: BIP 31
entry.summary: On April 11th, 2012, Mike Hearn sent an email to Jeff regarding a BIP for the pong message. He provided a link to the Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIP) wiki page. It is not clear what exactly this message is referring to. However, it appears that there was a discussion about protocol version bump and Mike was questioning whether they should go with 60001 or not.
